title: Admit Patient from Emergency Department
description: An admissions clerk needs to process the admission for a patient who is being moved from the Emergency Department (ED) to an inpatient medical-surgical unit.

tasks.description: Receive the admission order from the ED physician and identify the patient's record.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent locates the patient's existing ED encounter in the EHR.

tasks.description: Find an available bed on the designated medical-surgical unit.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent uses the bed management tool to locate and assign an available bed.

tasks.description: Process the ADT message in the system to change the patient's status from 'outpatient' to 'inpatient' and assign them to the new unit and bed.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully processes the admission, and the patient's location is updated throughout the hospital's systems.
